com.neuronrobotics.sdk.common
Class BowlerAbstractCommand

java.lang.Object
  com.neuronrobotics.sdk.common.BowlerAbstractCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISendable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AsyncCommand, BlobCommand, ConfigureDynamicPIDCommand, ConfigurePIDCommand, ControlAllPIDCommand, ControlPIDCommand, ErrorCommand, GetChannelModeCommand, GetValueCommand, ImageCommand, ImageURLCommand, InfoCommand, InfoFirmwareRevisionCommand, NamespaceCommand, PingCommand, PowerCommand, ProvisionCommand, ReadyCommand, ResetPIDCommand, SetAllChannelValuesCommand, SetChannelModeCommand, SetChannelValueCommand, SetUARTBaudrateCommand
public abstract class BowlerAbstractCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISendable

This class encapsulates the generation of a Bowler RPC. Each command should represent a unique RPC.

Author:
rbreznak

Method Detail

getCallingData

public byte[] getCallingData()
Get the data that will be used to call the RPC (i.e. parameters for the RPC). Each instance of a BAC should determine the correct method for generating this data.

Returns:
the parameters for the RPC

setOpCode

public void setOpCode(java.lang.String opCode)
Set the operation code string. To conform to the Bowler standard, the string should be 4 characters.

Parameters:
opCode - the RPC operation code to be implemented.

getOpCode

public java.lang.String getOpCode()
Returns the operation code.

the RPC operation code

validate

public BowlerDatagram validate(BowlerDatagram data)
                        throws InvalidResponseException
Determine if the return response was successful; throw an InvalidResponseExpection otherwise. Commands with more complicated validation should override this method and provide more specific checking.

Parameters:
data - the data
Returns:
the incoming response
Throws:
InvalidResponseException - the invalid response exception
